\{x\in\mathbb{R}  {\,}:{\,} x> a \ \text{und}\  x< b\}
= ] a; b[

\{x\in\mathbb{R}  {\,}:{\,} x> a \ \text{und}\  x\le b\}
= ] a; b]
\dfrac{a}{b} \pm \dfrac{c}{d} = \dfrac{a d\pm b c}{b d} \,, \,\, b d\neq 0 \, .
a\cdot(b\pm c) = a\cdot b\pm a\cdot c \,, \,\, (a\pm b)\cdot c = a\cdot c \pm b\cdot c \, .
a^p\cdot b^p = (a\cdot b)^p \,, \,\, \dfrac{a^p}{b^p} = \left(\dfrac{a}{b}\right)^p \,,  \,\, a^p\cdot a^q = a^{p+q} \,, \,\, \dfrac{a^p}{a^q} = a^{p-q} \,, \,\, (a^p)^q = a^{p\cdot q} \, .
